nodes.text: The Hieroprince was an individual part of religion of the Opaline Creed, a religious faction which was based on the Outer Rim planet Crucival in the time of the Galactic Empire. The Hieroprince had at least two sons, the second of whom was named Umu. The Creed  had at least seven of their members named after Umu in 4 BBY and kept a religious text known as the Tome of the Hieroprince, which at least one member, known as Umu Seven, constantly read. The faction also marked an event called the Hieroprince's Ascension.
The Hieroprince was mentioned in the 2015 novel Battlefront: Twilight Company, written by Alexander Freed.
